titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer - Overview

div.p: The CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer carries mandatory controls for a Commissioning Data Set Interchange and is only used by inclusion in other CDS Types.
Note that the CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer should only be used when submitting the CDS V6-2-2 Type 011 - Emergency Care CDS.

Commissioning Data Set Interchanges containing Commissioning Data Set Messages submitted to the Secondary Uses Service must use the required Commissioning Data Set Interchange and Message Header and Trailer Controls to provide the correct addressing and identification for the data flows.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set messages are usually sent in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange which consists of:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 001 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Header
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Interchange

li.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 003 - Commissioning Data Set Message Header
li.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Message

div.p: Dependent upon the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol being used, one of the following must be used:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

li.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

div.p: The CDS Type - As required to carry the specific Commissioning Data Set data records
Each Commissioning Data Set message ends with:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Message
Each Commissioning Data Set Interchange ends with:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.b: To access more detailed information on the Commissioning Data Sets, see the Commissioning Data Sets Introduction.

div.p: A high-level view of the Data Groups carried is shown below.
See Commissioning Data Set Notation for an explanation of Group Status and Group Repeats.

entry.b: DATA GROUP OVERVIEW: CDS V6-2-2 TYPE 002 - CDS INTERCHANGE TRAILER
FUNCTION: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission .
DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer
entry.p: One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary Uses Service. Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

div.p: See Commissioning Data Set Business Rules for an explanation of the business and/or processing rules which apply to individual Data Elements.
For guidance on the XML Schema constraints, see the Commissioning Data Set Version 6-2-2 XML Schema Constraints.
For guidance on downloading the XML Schema, see XML_Schema_TRUD_Download.
